title: FASCINATION TO INCREASE FLEXIBILITY / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Marco Paret and his students are exercising the unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques that they learned in his masterclass. They are in a Brazilian forest and Dr. Paret is using the technique of Fascination - the hypnotic power of the gaze. The subject becomes incredibly flexible while she stares into Dr. Paret's gaze. Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis school is the most advanced in the world. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
